title: Ashley began her banking career as a teller, bu...

content.prompt: Ashley began her banking career as a teller, but she was quickly promoted to increasingly more responsible managerial positions. Despite the fact that she has very limited experience to justify her promotions, she believes that she has been successful because she is very talented. Which of the following explanations is Ashley using to justify her success?

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
